Package org.springdata.cassandra.mapping

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CassandraPersistentEntity<T>
    Cassandra specific PersistentEntity abstraction.
    CassandraPersistentProperty
    Cassandra specific PersistentProperty extension.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicCassandraPersistentEntity<T>
    Cassandra specific BasicPersistentEntity implementation that adds Cassandra specific meta-data such as the table name.
    BasicCassandraPersistentProperty
    Cassandra specific AnnotationBasedPersistentProperty implementation.
    CachingCassandraPersistentProperty
    CassandraPersistentProperty caching access to CachingCassandraPersistentProperty.isIdProperty() and CachingCassandraPersistentProperty.getColumnName().
    CassandraMappingContext
    Default implementation of a MappingContext for Cassandra using BasicCassandraPersistentEntity and BasicCassandraPersistentProperty as primary abstractions.
    CassandraSimpleTypes
    Simple constant holder for a SimpleTypeHolder enriched with Cassandra specific simple types.
    DataTypeInformation
    Uses to transfer DataType and attributes for the property.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CassandraPersistentProperty.PropertyToColumnNameConverter
    Simple Converter implementation to transform a CassandraPersistentProperty into its column name.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Column
    Annotation to define custom metadata for document fields.
    Embeddable
    Defines embeddable class in the Cassandra table.
    Id
    Identifies primary key or ID in the Cassandra table.
    Indexed
    Identifies a secondary index in the table.
    KeyColumn
    Identifies partition key in the Cassandra composite primary key class.
    Qualify
    Qualifies data type as Cassandra type.
    Table
    Identifies a domain object to be persisted to Cassandra as a table.
    Tag
    Used to identify fields by a specific tag.
